tour.title: Bavaria, Austrian, and the Alps
tour.description: This seven day tour takes us through some of the more beautiful areas of Bavaria and Austria. Starting from Munich you will visit Garmisch in the Bavarian alps on your way to the beautiful city of Salzburg. From Salzburg, you will spend several days in in the mountain regions of Austria.

stop.title: Munich, Germany.
stop.description: Home of Oktoberfest, great beer and wonderful museums and streets.

stop.title: Garmisch, Germany.
stop.description: Major destination of the Bavarian alps. Site of a major World Cup ski race.

stop.title: Salzburg, Austria.
stop.description: City of baroque architecture and great music. Love it. Birthplace of Mozart. Nice cathedral.

stop.title: Zell am see. Austria.
stop.description: A must visit. Great starting point for hikes in the Austrian alps. Popular amongst the ultra-rich from Europe and the Middle East.

stop.title: Grossglockner, Austria
stop.description: Beautiful views. Some of best skiing in Austria.View of the highest mountain in the Austrian Alps, the Grossglockner.
